The video was originally posted on Reddi: claiming to show an unpaid employee destroying the boss' Mercedes Benz with an excavator.
The video was actually a viral marketing: directed by Rafael Bolliger for the Zurich creative agency Shortcuts.
The video was produced for Allianz24: an automotive insurance company in Switzerland, to draw attention to their services.
A: making of" video posted by the car insurance company on YouTube showed that the engine and fluids were removed from the Mercedes before it was destroyed.
